pr_title: Fix #2019: customResource.get() Returns 404 if name is specified

timeline.bodyText:
Is there any reason for concatenating the string > "stable.example.com/v1"
Maybe you actually meant: KubernetesDeserializer.registerCustomKind("stable.example.com","/v1", "CronTab", CronTab.class); ?
timeline.author: manusa

timeline.message:
Fix #2019: customResource.get() Returns 404 if name is specified

Added CustomResourceCrudTest for demonstrating usage of CRUD mode
for Custom Resources.
